title: [RG.REBOOT] Savant - Ascent (Game) 1.0.0.36
description:
Game Notes 
 	~~~~~~~~~~~
	UPDATED TO 1.0.0.36

	NEW FEATURES
	
	Time Attack Mode
	Endless Mode
	Balance and tweaks to gameplay
	Options
	Toggle amount of flashes
	Toggle enemy warnings
	Toggle fullscreen
	Sound/Music options
	

	A malicious orb has cast Savant out of his tower and transformed his surroundings into dangerous enemies!
	Dodge and shoot your way back up the tower, and blast down waves of enemies as you make your way towards the top! 
	As you progress, you unlock CDs that not only give you new tracks to play to, but also grant you powerful new abilities!

	Can you make it to the top?

	TRAILER:
	
	I bought this myself, for 2 flippin dollars. Just buy it and support D-Pad. They made this kickass game.
	

	A SPECIAL MESSAGE FROM REBOOT.OP!
	~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	To any releasers and/or suppliers out there, or perhaps even rippers, we need your help!

	RG.REBOOT is a new release group on the scene, run by a veteran ripper, whom would like to
	start their own release group.

	Below are sections that need members:
		- Rippers
		- Suppliers
		- Initial Seeders/Seedboxes
		- Theatrical Filmers
		- ASCII Artists

	If you are at all interested in joining our ranks, please don't fear to pop an e-mail to:

	Have a good day,
	~ REBOOT.OP
